title: The smite meta is getting ridiculous
body:
So I just had this game where the entire team had smite.. you know when in loading screen you kinda chuckle because back in the days, if you took smite in lane it automatically meant you were severely gimping your dueling potential.

Now add Challenging smite to the champion. So now they get a free 20% damage reduction for a whopping 4 seconds. But no good sir, I have ignite! I will still outduel them! Nope, they get a free 54 + 6 × level true damage over 3 seconds while trading. That means that after 2 or 3 auto's they have already outdamaged your ignite.

But ignite has much lower cooldown than challenging smite! Oh wait, 210 seconds cooldown vs 75 seconds.

But they have put 850 gold into a useless lane item!! Again wrong, the smiter just goes to the jungle and smites a camp, going into lane with a level advantage. Perhaps recall early and miss a couple CS but with XP and gold advantage. They can do this whenever they go back to buy.

Then enter the final nail in the coffin.. {{item:3931}} . This item (when stacked) is so broken it's beyond ridiculous already. Of course Riot will never admit that but that doesn't make it less true. Every champion is balanced around numbers and they just release this item without even considering the consequences. Champions like {{champion:105}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:106}} aren't supposed to proc their on hit counters so often. To add insult to injury they even gave it a magic damage proc. So champions like {{champion:105}} {{champion:67}} can just kill you in 4 autos with no itemization to counter it.

It just means I dodge queue every time I see these champions because it's getting out of hand. So please Riot fix this mess :S

replies.body: I agree, nerf Neith.
SMITE pls

I won a game as Runeglaive Garen yesterday. Decisive strike was doing over 1k magic damage by the end lol
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1891703500/217750770?tab=overview

http://apollo-na-uploads.s3.amazonaws.com/1421459013488/YouraWizardGaren.jpg

It's Back!!!

Then you go and look at the statistics of the new "broken" item, and realize it really isnt broken at all.

You also imply laners could even gain access to that item within 30 minutes, while maintaining a lane.

lmfao -

The whole concept of it is broken. I have seen the both sides of the coin. I have seen games won by junglers with no devourer vs a deviourer because they focused o ganks a lot.

However. I have seen games won solely by devourer junglers. I now shudder once i remember when i meet kayle after she farmed for 25 mins. It didnt matter how fed i was or what i did, she killed me like i was 10 levels below her.

The whole concept of this item is flawed. Do you remember feral flare? This item is like that, but even more broken. It is either feast or famine item. You will either lose the game for team with having no jungler ganks or you will carry them by being able to 1 vs 3 easily. There is no middle ground with this item.

Not really.

Flare was broken because it infinently stacked, and forced you to afk farm.

This item promotes team/objective play, and caps out with a lategame bonus.

The item is ment for carrying, which is what the champions that buy it need to do. If you couldnt carry with it, it would be trash.

The item's winrate is not very high. It is not being abused in competetive. The only people complaining seem to be people who don't realize how easy it is to punish this item. Most of the champions who buy it are countered by cc, which tanks have. Now, the argument that devourer users shred tanks is valid, so that is 50/50. Yi won't be doing shit if he gets rqauto'd by a nautilus, but he also will rip everyone's ass open if he doesnt get cc'd or debuffed at all.

So, we take the obvious counterplay built in. Pick a counterjungler. Take scuttles. Take dragon. Clear enemy jungle.

People have no idea how free that shit is.

Now, I am aware {{champion:102}} exists. She doesnt seem to be doing too crazy, but riot should keep tabs on her nonetheless. 

Early game junglers work as well. Shitstomp the early game so hard that the enemy cant recover.
Yep

> [{quoted}](name=A Miss Fortune,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-07-19T20:16:58.127+0000)
>
> Yep

I raise you one good sir, 5 drags in a row and 2 barons :D
Why the fuck does Kha have sated 0_o

> [{quoted}](name=The True Bard,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000400020000,timestamp=2015-07-20T23:22:39.308+0000)
>
> Why the fuck does Kha have sated 0_o

5 smite team and your questioning a goofy item build, but as far I know the premise is double Q proc with passive = crazy damage
of all people to not use smite the AD TF. Sated Devourer would make his E proc faster am I wrong?
meanwhile Lee sin using Devourer when he has no on-hit to speak of but great AD scaling that makes Warrior unfathomably better.

You know the other "wonderfull" part of this item? It also procs on hit effects. I think you know what lee's passive is dont you? He has to hit shit to regain energy. WIth devourer all of his energy management issues are solved and you can aswell mash every button you see. Increased aa damage and more on hit effects is just a bonus.

nothing is free you lazy ass people. every time you decide to take some thing over another you give up a power you could have had for a power you want. ignite had its time (and its still going on) teleport had its time it is heal's time now and smite is picking up. when you decide to take some thing you take it with a strategy to use it.
its the sated devourer that is so op on some champions if you dont kill them in 2 seconds your whole team is doomed

but thats the problem here 
there is no downside to the strat ... every downside that should exist here is patched up to be unexistant

people don't look to make stratiges to have down sides, but the down side is that the damage isnt reliable if you aren't able to continuously hit the enemy. but we dont want to admit that cause you want to be able to safely burst the enemy down. i dont jungle much and i have tried to take smite into lane but it isnt as convient as people try to make it seem  you have to build an item to  use smite on champions which is another down side to the strategy. you cant be reasonable though cause you trying to get smite nerfed. 
i want to see it nerfed too because it is ridiculously strong on certain champions. but to go as far as no down side is just being biased.
How do you continuously hit something that kills you in .2 seconds flat with like 3 autos...
thats what you are not supposed to do obviously if you cant duel it then stop dueling it

1000+ true dmg tho, wtf? I was not under the impression true dmg was meant to be used this way, rather a rare thing b/c you can't do anything to mitigate it. :/ 

I really wish they had not put this item in the game, it absolutely throws off the jungle in the same way Cinderhulk and that jungle item that did the _same shit_ last season did. That bans are based around an Item rather then _kits _of champions seems like a bad thing.
Vayne was full on-hit/AS, minus BF, and fighting full armor/health tank, so it's a given she will deal more true damage.

Jungers being meaningful again? NERF!!!

Seriously, all the items are fine now except for Warrior which needs a buff.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-19T20:13:46.460+0000)
>
> Jungers being meaningful again? NERF!!!
> 
> Seriously, all the items are fine now except for Warrior which needs a buff.

Devourer is slowly pushing all other junglers out of viability.. runeglaive is pretty much only useful for mid laners

> [{quoted}](name=Intimidator,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-07-19T20:20:27.891+0000)
>
> Devourer is slowly pushing all other junglers out of viability.. runeglaive is pretty much only useful for mid laners

Runeglaive going to be gone for midlaners.

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Poro,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-19T20:13:46.460+0000)
>
> Jungers being meaningful again? NERF!!!
> 
> Seriously, all the items are fine now except for Warrior which needs a buff.

This is why you can't take Boards Seriously. They complain about anything that can Hyper carry a game. And that includes just about anyone who uses Sated Devourer. Theirs nothing inherently wrong with the passive that helps a class of champion that has been behind recently. Granted their are some champs who use it better than others. 

But no one on boards, take responsibility for not Snowballing off the weakness during Devourer's stacking period. And call BS on it's late game potential.

Thats the fcking point. Those champs which were buffed by devourer were already scary lategame carries. Before devourer master yi was a nightmare lategame. With devourer? He became outright broken in lategame.

The aoutoattacking junglers were not at all behind. They were strong and used a lot of times. However, this buff made them the dominant class whichle shoving any other class away.

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2015-07-20T12:05:30.165+0000)
>
> Thats the fcking point. Those champs which were buffed by devourer were already scary lategame carries. Before devourer master yi was a nightmare lategame. With devourer? He became outright broken in lategame.
> 
> The aoutoattacking junglers were not at all behind. They were strong and used a lot of times. However, this buff made them the dominant class whichle shoving any other class away.

Any fed ADC is better than Yi.
Corki can burst a Yi before he comes near. Vayne can kite him.
Yi is now viable but is no monster.

Unless that Corki has 1k ad i doubt he would. And no, no fed adc is better than a devourer yi, even vayne.

Unless you are a tank yi will kill you in 2 seconds flat with 2 aa and q with full build. This is not an exaguration.

Yi was always viable, he was a dangerous lategame carry even before the devourer, i know. I saw and played with him. On Diamond/Platinum no less.

With devourer buff his damage output roughly doubled.

I seriously dont know what skill you are or how long you are playing. But if you will tell me that yi was unviable or weak before the devourer, i will call bullshit and will simply regard to you as "Bronzie".

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=00030001000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-20T16:32:17.733+0000)
>
> Unless that Corki has 1k ad i doubt he would. And no, no fed adc is better than a devourer yi, even vayne.
> 
> Unless you are a tank yi will kill you in 2 seconds flat with 2 aa and q with full build. This is not an exaguration.
> 
> Yi was always viable, he was a dangerous lategame carry even before the devourer, i know. I saw and played with him. On Diamond/Platinum no less.
> 
> With devourer buff his damage output roughly doubled.
> 
> I seriously dont know what skill you are or how long you are playing. But if you will tell me that yi was unviable or weak before the devourer, i will call bullshit and will simply regard to you as "Bronzie".

Well, your profile is pretty wrong then. I guess you have another acc on diamond/platinum that you play master yi in ranked?
Yi for a late game carry was horrible after the feral flare nerfs. You can pick any carry  for top lane and try your luck while having a tank in Yi's place that you have a better game. Hyper carries thrive on high gold income, that was the case of old feral flare, gold and faster clear times with quicker respawns (you could solo baron with a feral flare and spirit stone). You could get feral at 12 minutes. Now you expect your "sated" at 17~20.The new devourer is a mid game spike, where Yi is better as snowballing during the early game.
Yes. Corki can burst you. Graves can burst you. Vayne can own you if you don't Q the condem and don't use a red trinket for her ult. ADCs have the upper hand. Yi isn't a great diver unless you get someone out of position or burn a flash.

Yi was way better during S4. Back then he could actually 2 shot someone.
Sure, you can play Yi, get to diamond/plat, (hell I did - http://www.lolking.net/summoner/br/6901184#ranked-stats ), but there are way better picks if you wanna be a one trick poney. I like to define viable as boxbox defines riven being viable "one more nerf and I will drop her". 
I play Yi because I like all the "git gud", "no skill champion" that goes on all chat when you outplay people.

No, this season i have not played yi in ranked. I was busy playing another champion that was ok but then made broken by the devourer, xin. However, i did play him after the destruction of feral. And i will say it again. YI was ok.

NOt only that, i had yi in my team and my enemy team many times before. And he was indeed a really strong lategame carry.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hyper carries do not always thrive on high gold income. So hyper carries just have kits designed to work without a huge income. For example vayne and yi, both of which are hypercarries, need only 1 item to get rolling. Blade of the broken king. They get stronger the more gold they amass, but please, stop with the bullshit that hypercarries can not be in the jungle. They can. They really can. And they could even before the broken devourer.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also, i do not think you know anything about yi. Yi doesnt have a good early, by no means. yi's early is dreadfull compared to any other jungler. Yi only gets a power spike once he gets his ulti. The new devourer isnt a mid game spike. It is just broken.

Like i said before, feral flare and the new iteration of it called the devourer. Are feast/famine items. EIther you will lose miserably or carry everyone. If enemy jungler takes the advantage and ganks REALLY much by 20 minute and the devourer jungler is just stupid and ignore his team because stacks, then the devourer jungler will lose.

However, if the devourer jungler farms and at the same time ganks, he can still have his devourer ready by 20 minute and prevent enemy from taking any strong actions with ganks.

How do i know this? Jungling with xin. I managed to both  gank and farm up my devourer by 20-25 minute mark. THe enemy couldnt do anything. I played with xin before the devourer and i instantly felt the difference. The current xin was 100% stronger than my old xin without devourer. I could do my q knockup in 2 hits, not 3. I could heal incredibly fast, i could do so much damage that even fiora would be ashamed.

Devourer simply put, made xin from allready strong champ, into a broken one. The same happened with shyvana, kayle, yi.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Adc's can burst, thats right. But even they wont outburst a yi. A smart yi has his q and w at disposal. And yi will kill them faster than they manage to kill me, i have seen this far too many times.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The only time, that yi was better than the current version, was the days of ap yi. No other iteration is stronger than the new one, even feral flare yi pales in comparison to this new item.

He can still 2 shot people, with this item especially.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ALso about "better picks" dont give me that bullshit. I play jayce as adc when i get the role, there are "way better picks" yet this pick works and i do well with it. Hell i main goddamn fcking shen. Better picks? My ass. THere are no better picks. THere are just different picks.

Everyone regarded urgot as a troll champion before, and now look what happens, since he was used by pros hes considered viable. He has a place where he excels.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ALso, please, dont even talk about boxox here. The guy couldnt balance out a fcking tray with nothing on it even if his life depended on it. RIven is strong. Really strong. Not only viable.

> [{quoted}](name=Dextix LT,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0003000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-20T20:05:17.068+0000)
>

Please. Understand my concept of viable. EVERY CHAMPION is ok, as I said you can one trick poney any champion you want. Viable are the FOTM. The over the top. For me some champions aren't viable, picking them is throwing away better picks. 
Still, I recognize that your viable concept is more adequate with a thesaurus. 


> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Geez. I guess I know nothing. Plat with only one champion means nothing. Please. MAIN it before you can rub in ones face "you know nothing" or at least play it in ranked. Seeing someone else play with it is something. Actually playing it is another.
Yi as a FARM jungler has a better start than most hyper carries that people are throwing in the jungle (Kayle, vayne, twitch). Sure. Yi gets a power spike with lvl 6. WW too, FIddle, twitch, orianna.. etc. etc etc.... (Sad {{champion:77}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:126}}  etc.., exceptions {{champion:421}} {{champion:223}} ). Lvl 6 is generaly a powerspike in anyone kit. If you mean that it enables ganks, I totatlly agree with you.
Yi as a GANK jungler sucks.
Yi as a control jungler, sucks.
Yi as counter jungler sucks.

Feral flare was a way more broken item than the current devourer. 
Please. Don't compare xin with Yi. Xin has CC, can be built tanky and still be relevant  because of the burst, he can even initiate and use  with ult to broke the enemy frontline. The play pattern is totally different with yi. Xin counter ganks are good (before and after 6). Yi has poor counter ganks, working generally as the clean up team (with people picking TP for that in early game). Apples and oranges.

When I said about early game: "where Yi is better as snowballing during the early game." You can consider Yi as an assassin with snowballing potential. But he doesn't  scale well in late game during TFs. Thats why you have to win before the late game. Feral flare gave a huge power  at 12 min that made Yi an unstoppable beast. 20 min as a devourer? No problem. I'm happy that he can solo baron again, but he could do it better and earlier in s4.


> 

> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> 
I agree with AP yi. Not with devourer.
> 
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


"I can play jayce as an ADC and win!"  Yes. Trissexual played only karthus in any role in diamond (suport, jungle, adc, mid, top...). It doesn't mean it was the better pick for other players.I said before and I say again. One trick poney. 
It's the same way when you compare cars. Sure, you can carry stuff with your Nascar race car but it will have problems with space. You can use your truck in a F-1 race. Good luck winning.  
Btw. urgot generally is a niche pick.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Yes. Devourer is a feast and famine item . You can call it a  better name:  win harder.
If your laners can play safe and don't distribute free gold to the enemy team, you will have the advantage.

This season JG is the only position that really has power in the game. The only exception is if one laner can get crazy fed and roam, but even then they can't do as much as a jg. Jglers have SO many options when it comes to builds now that they have an answer against any comp they are playing against. Compared to JG the laners just seem pointless.

> [{quoted}](name=Mr Trianglez,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=00030003,timestamp=2015-07-20T02:37:32.251+0000)
>
> This season JG is the only position that really has power in the game. The only exception is if one laner can get crazy fed and roam, but even then they can't do as much as a jg. Jglers have SO many options when it comes to builds now that they have an answer against any comp they are playing against. Compared to JG the laners just seem pointless.

S4 was a better season to junglers. Do you even jungle bro?
No actually, the only jg I play is Elise. I'm just going off of my experiences in season 4 and 5. There are a lot more options in season 5.

Welcome to season 5, where jungler became an even better season.

Sadly, it was only for some junglers.
'Vayne is clearly already pretty fed, and I'm pretty behind (2/7/5). I have built almost full armor. I am shocked that Vayne's true damage has dealt most of the damage to me.'

> [{quoted}](name=Hellioning,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-07-20T07:24:32.411+0000)

anyways i was 2/2 then vayne got sated lol

> [{quoted}](name=Intimidator,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2015-07-20T17:59:21.874+0000)

You mean {{item:3143}} + {{item:3068}} + {{item:3047}} + {{item:1029}} + {{item:1031}} = Full Armor, no sarcasm quotes required **because that is literally what your build is.**

That's nearly 200 bonus Armor right there.

> [{quoted}](name=JustMyBassCannon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000c00000000,timestamp=2015-07-20T18:06:59.267+0000)

> 
> That's nearly 200 bonus Armor right there.

My point is nobody could tank that sated Vayne, nobody could assassinate her due to smite + condemn + tumble + invisibility + support. The game was just forfeit by then (around 20 min mark). At least without devourer she actually has to auto attack 3 times to proc that true damage. Not to mention it procs {{item:3153}}  twice also.

So nobody on your team took Exhaust, hard CC or a sweeper, and you didn't expect Vayne to fucking shred you all?

You let her build up a Devourer and a BotRK, didn't bring counter-measures (or didn't use them), and you're surprised that you lost.

> [{quoted}](name=JustMyBassCannon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000c0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-20T18:54:14.758+0000)
>
> So nobody on your team took Exhaust, hard CC or a sweeper, and you didn't expect Vayne to fucking shred you all?
> 
> You let her build up a Devourer and a BotRK, didn't bring counter-measures (or didn't use them), and you're surprised that you lost.

We hard cc'd her every teamfight (taunt + stun) but we could not kill her due to her support with shields and with her teammates of course. After that the tanks basically just died and then she killed our backline. We're talking solo queue here not LCS level of play where they have proper teamwork etc.

Then again perhaps the problem lies with {{champion:67}} not per se {{item:3931}}

> [{quoted}](name=Intimidator,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=000c00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-21T10:38:01.249+0000)
>
> We hard cc'd her every teamfight (taunt + stun) but we could not kill her due to her support with shields and with her teammates of course.

You locked her out of the fight, and she could somehow survive at least 4 seconds of standing still. In the middle of your team.

The frickin _paper tiger_ is in the middle, and nobody thought, "KILL IT WITH FIRE"

Also, what support could possibly provide enough shield to keep someone alive for 4 seconds?
> Then again perhaps the problem lies with {{champion:67}} not per se {{item:3931}}

Maybe the problem lies in players not knowing better than to let a late-game champion snowball with two hardcore snowball items.
yea i been playing alot of sated devourer jungle vayne. and if you get sated before 20 mins the enemy mindswell FF lol

> [{quoted}](name=Its All Skillzz,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-19T19:39:57.379+0000)

Should try ap gnar.
Every other attack 100% ap + 14% max hp

don't forget when smite is stacked at 2, you get another 10 seconds in, -4 seconds, it can really be up in 6 seconds again. so 20% for reduction + bonus dmg for 8 seconds over the course of 6 seconds. sounds balanced to me.

and you know what i love about it, everytime they reintroduce FF, ww goes from trash to caner because his ult is fking retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=Summoner Grey,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bTa0txE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-19T19:38:13.369+0000)
>

> 
> and you know what i love about it, everytime they reintroduce FF, ww goes from trash to caner because his ult is fking retarded.

Ignoring the fact that sated devourer doesn't work with his ult, but why let facts get in the way of your argument eh?
On top of that Sated Devourer pretty muich screws over jungle balance. Either your jungler can use that item, or he's downright useless and will use to the enemy sated-dev jungler...
Meanwhile runeglaive nid? Warrior lee? Cinderhulk Gragas and Rek'sai?
